div.a: Walnut Hill Elementary requests public input

span.p: The SBDM at Walnut Hill Elementary is establishing principal candidate criteria and would like to invite WHE staff and community members to share the criteria they feel will be most important when considering a new principal candidate. The survey will be available until Friday, April 24th. We appreciate all input and support!
